descriptionHtml:
H E N T A I \'s   N I G H T M A R E    A R M O R


release date      : March 2012
Category          : Armor
Armor Type      : heavy
Body               : Doesn\'t matter
Mod version      : 1.0
Author             : Hentai


Description
===========
Nightmare Armor
Create this armor with Deadric heart and leather strips at any forge


Contents
========
1 Torso dress
1 Boots
1 gloves


Install
=======
Extract the archive. Take the folders \"meshes\", \"textures\" and paste them in your Skyrim/Data folder. 


Uninstall
=========
Delete Folder
Skyrim\\Data\\Meshes\\armor\\Hentai\\oh
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\armor\\Hentai\\oh

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for the best games.
dimon99:  DIMONIZED UNP female body.


Tools Used
==========
Blender
NIFSkope
Photoshop
CrazyBump


Permissions
==========
1.  Feel free to use everything in this file.

2.  Everything I made for Obliviion is free to convert to Skyrim. Since Im not going to convert them myself.
     
3. Do not upload this file on Steam Workshop until furthur notice. ( I like Nexus so much more as a modder)


Hentai Works
========
Type \"Hentai\" at the SkyNexus search tap
